testimonials.content: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
testimonials.name: Herman Jensen
testimonials.title: Founder & Leader

testimonials.content: Money makes your life easier. If you're lucky to have it, you're lucky.
